build.buildCommand: npm install && npm run prisma:generate && npm run build

deploy.startCommand: npx prisma migrate resolve --applied 20250120130900_add_original_media_url 2>/dev/null || true; npx prisma migrate deploy 2>&1 || npx prisma db push --accept-data-loss 2>&1 || true; pwd && ls -la && ls -la dist/ 2>&1 || echo 'dist not found'; find . -name 'main.js' -type f 2>&1 | head -5; node dist/main.js
